attributes.action: Fully fund feed in tariffs and reverse planned cuts to feed in tariffs.
attributes.additional_details: It is widely reported in the press that thousands of jobs have been lost and are being lost in the solar renewable sector due to planned government cuts to feed in tariffs.  It is important to reverse these cuts, so the United Kingdom solar renewable sector can develop and mature and to protect the jobs of those in the sector.  The solar renewable sector also provides an important role in the battle against climate change.
attributes.background: This is important to support the renewable energy sector and to safe guard jobs, particularly in the solar energy sector.
